meanings.sent1: She frequented the library to borrow books every week.
meanings.sent2: He frequented the park to enjoy the fresh air.
meanings.sent3: The cat frequented the kitchen in hopes of finding a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts frequented memories of his childhood like a familiar melody.
meanings.sent5: The old man frequented the same bench in the park, watching the world go by.

meanings.definition: To be a regular visitor to a place
meanings.sent1: They frequented the local cafe for their morning coffee.
meanings.sent2: The family frequented the beach every summer for vacation.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel frequented the backyard, searching for nuts buried in the ground.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter frequented the halls, bringing joy to all who heard it.
meanings.sent5: The loyal customers frequented the small bakery, savoring the delicious pastries.
